subject: Surgery and Surgeons
lead_paragraph: Chicago Bears linebacker Brian Urlacher recently had minor neck surgery. He is expected to be fully recovered when training camp starts in July. Urlacher, who will be 30 in May, said he had an arthritic back condition that forced him at times to play in pain.
